name: Coconut Chai Spice Latte
description: Chai Lattes are a luscious beverage for any occasion. Chill out by serving over crushed ice.
preparation: Combine Chai Spice and ground coffee together, and then prepare coffee with water in a French coffee press.
Heat coconut milk in glass measuring cup, in microwave on high for 1 minute, or until steamy. Froth in a milk frother.
Pour coffee into 2 mugs, 1⁄2 to 3⁄4 full .
Pour in frothed coconut milk and serve, sweeten to taste.
